"7.Never call a Player "Dark Requiem Shaiya" if you have no proof, if u see a "Dark Requiem Shaiya" then make a video or call a ADM/GS."

Can you explain this statement? I can't make sense of it...Dark Requiem Shaiya is a game correct?..so why would someone call a player Dark Requiem Shaiya...and why would this require proof?....please explain
oh well that explains it...thanks for the info chief
